description:
Explore via ferrata routes with this lanyard. It's equipped with 2 Vertigo Wirelock carabiners and retractable arms that won't interfere with your movement. A third arm facilitates traverses or allows you to attach it to a bar in order to rest.

  • Energy absorber in a zippered protective pouch for easy visual inspection
  • Double action keylock carabiners have wide openings for quick operation
  • Twisted attachment sling facilitates connection to the harness with a girth hitch
  • Lanyard retracted length is 77cm. Extended length is 108cm
  • Short arm length is 32cm. (Must be used with a locking carabiner, not included.)
  • Certified for users 40-120kg
name: Petzl Scorpio Vertigo Lanyard
